attributes.action: Support Chinas authority in Tibet & denounce the Dalai Lama
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not withstanding any other political issues with the Chinese regime we the undersigned call on the British Government to support its legitimate & historic claim to autonomy over Tibet. The Tibetan people have benefited enormously since their liberation from virtual serfdom under the autocratic subjugation of the minority ruling elite headed by the Dalai Lama. We call on the British Government to persuade the Dalai Lama to relinquish any claim to authority in Tibet & ask him to call for an end to violent protests.
